name: Introduction to Journalism
description: In this course, students will learn the basics of Journalism, including news gathering and writing, ethical considerations and responsibilities of a journalist, and using tools such as media and technology in their work.

name: Introduction to War Journalism
description: This course introduces students to the unique aspects of war journalism, including coverage of conflicts from a war zone, ethical considerations when reporting from a war zone, and the use of media and technology in war journalism.

name: Advanced War Journalism Reporting
description: This course will give students a more in-depth understanding of war journalism, including the importance of accuracy and detail in reporting, the importance of objectivity when reporting on the war, and safety considerations for reporters working in a war zone.

name: War Journalism Ethics and Practices
description: This course will provide students with an understanding of the ethical considerations and practices of war journalism, including the importance of neutrality and unbiased reporting, the implications of media coverage in war zones, and the impact of war journalism on public opinion.
